actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the General Services Administration to release a condition contained in a deed conveying certain real property to the city of Lowell, Mass.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the General Services Administration to release a condition contained in a deed conveying the "Old Post Office Site and Building" to the city of Lowell, Massachusetts.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the General Services Administration to release a condition contained in a deed conveying certain real property to the city of Lowell, Mass.
